Interfaces and classes for user code that interacts with the scan system. For interacting with the scan system from Java, Jython, Matlab, ... code, refer to these:
  • {@link org.csstudio.scan.client.ScanServerConnector}
  • {@link org.csstudio.scan.server.ScanServer}
For {@link org.csstudio.scan.command.ScriptCommand} scripts that are executed on the scan server with a scan, see:
  • {@link org.csstudio.scan.command.ScanScript}
  • {@link org.csstudio.scan.command.ScanScriptContext}
